snippet: With colleges failing to protect students, the White House and some legislators finally take steps to combat sexual assault.
abstract: Editorial supports Obama administration's efforts to address sexual violence on college campuses around United States; notes government has released list of 55 colleges and universities under federal investigation over their handling of sexual assault complaints and issued recommendations on how to combat campus sexual assault; calls efforts encouraging first step.
lead_paragraph: With colleges failing to protect students, the White House and some legislators finally take steps to combat sexual assault.

headline.main: Washington Weighs in on Campus Assaults
headline.print_headline: Washington Weighs in on Campus Assaults
